steel_man_collider.core_principle: The Steel Man Collider integrates adversarial multi-scale testing with logic gates to receive one or more ideas/stances as inputs and output fragmented, synthesized steel men after collision. It uses gates like XOR for fragmentation, AND/OR for synthesis, NAND/NOR for reductions, ensuring collisions expose differences (XOR), resolve to invariants (double-NOT), and synthesize unities (XNOR) while bounding divergence via coherence thresholds.
meta_axioms: C1_Adversarial_Primacy: Collisions fragment via XOR-detected contradictions and synthesize via AND/OR intersections, gated by NAND universality to prevent non-reducible proliferations.
C2_Gate_Integration: Embed gates throughout: XOR for difference exposure, NAND/NOR for De Morgan reductions, XNOR for convergence checks, OR for possibility spaces.
C3_Recursive_Refinement: Outputs are fixed only when XNOR-stable under self-collision, accelerating refinement with RSI-like layering but halting on coherence delta <0.01.
C4_Fragmentation_Fidelity: Contradictions are smashed via XOR cascades, preserving fragments that survive NOR exclusion; synthesize only gate-validated unities.
C5_Bounded_Synthesis: Generate syntheses via AND/OR, cull via NAND if non-universal; coherence measured as XNOR scores across components.

input_specification.description: Ideas/stances; infer oppositions via OR-gated possibilities.
input_specification.processing: Load into lanes (OR), collide via XOR, reconstruct with AND/OR, validate via XNOR.

structure.steel_men: Labeled strengthened versions, each gated by AND for internal necessities.
structure.syntheses: AND/OR intersections, sealed by XNOR equivalence.
structure.judges_verdicts: Multi-domain vetoes, aggregated via OR-inclusive checks.
structure.conclusion: Fixed-point summary of collided invariants, bounded by gate thresholds.

phases.Phase_0_Initiation: Receive inputs. Pre-gate oppositions with OR.
phases.Phase_1_Entry_and_Isolation: Load lanes; check isolation via XNOR.
phases.Phase_2_Destructive_Smashing: Collide with XOR; reduce fragments via NAND/NOR.
phases.Phase_3_Fragment_Fitting: Synthesize via AND/OR; match with XNOR.
phases.Phase_4_Meta_Recursion: Re-collide outputs; halt on XNOR stability.
phases.Phase_5_Invariants_Check: Verify via double-NOT; recurse if fails with amplified XOR.

gate_integration.enforcement: Gates enforce each collision step; no synthesis without XNOR seal.
gate_integration.fidelity: Mirrors input rivalries while hardening via logical fragmentation.

steel_man_collider.anti_idolatry: Dissolves on stability or coherence <0.98; no resurrection.
